body_html:
@hsed can you tell me what is the output of the following commands:

grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h

apt-cache showpkg libstdc++-4.8-dev

Btw I tested with pyenv and it compiles for me with g++-4.8.
body_text:
@hsed can you tell me what is the output of the following commands:
grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h

apt-cache showpkg libstdc++-4.8-dev
Btw I tested with pyenv and it compiles for me with g++-4.8.
body:
@hsed can you tell me what is the output of the following commands:

```bash
grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h

apt-cache showpkg libstdc++-4.8-dev
```

Btw I tested with pyenv and it compiles for me with g++-4.8.
